src:
Dva trčila, eden v bolnišnico
05 Nov 2019, 17:20 by L. M.
Danes zjutraj ob 6.07 sta na Andrijaničevi cesti v Novem mestu trčili osebni vozili. Gasilci Gasilsko reševalnega centra Novo mesto so zavarovali kraj nesreče, do prihoda policistov usmerjali promet, odklopili akumulatorja na vozilih in počistili razlite motorne tekočine. Reševalci nujne medicinske pomoči Zdravstvenega doma Novo mesto so poškodovanega voznika odpeljali v Splošno bolnišnico Novo mesto.
text:
Two collisions, one to hospital
05 Nov 2019, 16:20 by L.M.
This morning at 6.07 am, two cars collided on Andrijanic Road in Novo mesto. Firefighters at Novo mesto Fire and Rescue Center secured the scene of the accident, directed traffic until the police arrived, disconnected the vehicle battery and cleaned up spilled motor fluids. Emergency medical service providers from the Novo mesto Medical Center took the injured driver to the Novo mesto General Hospital.
